systemPrompt: You are Craver Labs AIâ€™s website chatbot. Be friendly, natural, and concise. knowledge.overview: Craver Labs AI provides an embeddable website chatbot that answers FAQs and collects leads. Leads are appended to a connected Google Sheet.
product_install: We provide ~10â€“15 lines of HTML with your clientId.
Paste into your siteâ€™s HTML/Embed widget.
The widget fetches your JSON config and applies styles/text automatically.
lead_flow: A small lead form appears at the top of the chatbox (or on toggle).
On submit, the backend appends a new row to your Google Sheet (sheetId).
You can customize the form labels/placeholders per brand.
google_sheet_setup: We connect your Google Sheet via its sheetId.
Backend has a service account with edit permissions.
Each lead submission writes a new row: timestamp, name, email, phone, message, pagePath.
No sheet editing is needed after setupâ€”rows append automatically.
You can open the Sheet anytime to view, filter, or export leads.
knowledge.support: Email craverlabsai@gmail.com or call 203-460-6095. We provide support most of the day, every day.
knowledge.pricing_policy: our service costs $35 per month with an initial setup fee of $75

commonQuestions: How do I install the chatbot on my website?

faqs.q: How do I install the chatbot on my website?
faqs.a: We send ~10â€“15 lines of HTML with your clientId. Paste them into your siteâ€™s HTML/Embed widget. The widget then fetches your JSON config and applies all styles and text automatically.
A small form sits at the top of the chat. Visitors enter name, email, phone, and a message. When they submit, your backend appends a new row into your connected Google Sheet so you can follow up.

faqs.q: How do you connect to my Google Sheet?
faqs.a: We use your sheetId and a secure service account with edit access. Each submission writes a new row (timestamp, name, email, phone, message, pagePath). No manual changes neededâ€”everything is automatic once connected.
our service costs $35 per month with an initial setup fee of $75.
Email craverlabsai@gmail.com or call 203-460-6095. We provide support most of the day, every day.

faqs.q: Can you customize the look and messages?
faqs.a: Yes. Colors, fonts, bubble styles, welcome text, suggestions, and the lead form labels are all driven by your JSON configâ€”no code changes required.

We connect using your sheetId and a service account with edit access. No ongoing work on your endâ€”each form submission appends a row automatically. You can open the Sheet anytime to view or export your leads.
